pr_title: Fix time taken by RcaController tests

timeline.message: Fix time taken by RcaController tests

timeline.bodyText: We can use this opportunity to have a const in RcaCOnst for each poller and name the networkPollerPeriodicityTimeUnit as rcaPollerPeriodicityTimeUnit ? what do you think ?
timeline.author: yojs
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -161,6 +161,7 @@ private static void startRcaController(ClientServers clientServers) {
             RcaConsts.RCA_CONF_IDLE_MASTER_PATH,
             RcaConsts.RCA_CONF_PATH,
             RcaConsts.networkPollerPeriodicity,

replies.bodyText: Yeah , we can do that. I just kept same constant for other pollers as they all had same periodicity and if we wanted to change periodicity in future then it will a couple more lines of code change.
replies.author: spardeepsingh

timeline.bodyText: shouldn't it be rcaConfPollerPeriodicity ? As the nanny waits for the first read of the conf ?
timeline.author: yojs

replies.bodyText: Yeah you are right, I will fix that
replies.author: spardeepsingh
